content: *chain 1 skip next st 1 double_crochet into each of next 2 sts repeat from * ending last repeat with 1 chain skip next st 1 double_crochet into last st row 2 chain 1 1 single_crochet into first chain space chain 3 2 double_crochet into same chain space * 1sc chain 3 1sc into next chain 1 space repeat from * ending last repeat with 1 single_crochet into last double_crochet fasten off weave in ends sleeves row 1 join yarn work single_crochet around often making 2 single_crochet into the same stitch so that the lace join isnʼt tight around the wrist the final number of scʼs are not important only that it is loose enough since the next row will make a ruffle anyway row 2 chain 2 2 double_crochet into each st fasten_off weave in ends
